channel.title: [24/7] BoomScape || 718 || HD Graphics || Skilling + PK || [24/7]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://boomscape.co.uk/forum/images/styles/grayfolio/images/logo-red.png[/img] [url=http://boomscape.co.uk]Boom Scape RSPS - Made for Perfection[/url] - - -[url=http://boomscape.co.uk/webclient/]Boom Scape RSPS - Webclient[/url] - - - [URL=http://"http://boomscape.co.uk/boomscape.jar"]Boom Scape 718 Client[/URL] - - - [url=http://boomscape.co.uk/forum/forum.php]Boom Scape Forums[/url]
BoomScape, we are a brand new server on the block, we use to be a running server with over 50 users last year but I had to end the server for personal reasons, but now we have come back greater then before, I have learnt a lot more within code in Java, HTML & PHP as I have studied at college. Our server is flawless, with lots of stuff to do, instead of most servers which give you a massive boost in exp we have a stable exp rate which makes skilling etc have a point as well as making money at the same time, all I am asking is for you guys to check it out and rate my server and maybe (if you can be asked) vote :d I really want to get this server of to a great start and hopefully with this advertisement it can get a lot of interest.
Server Images;
QBD [IMG]http://gyazo.com/bd9e0bfebaf8280205611b636257948a.png[/img]
Corp [IMG]http://gyazo.com/3a63b199433eaaac4cd7889a70137be8.png[/img]
Dicing for Donators [IMG]http://gyazo.com/d97b3ba9f63798d0d17d8227b6af8ecb.png[/img]
Nex with new Graphics [IMG]http://gyazo.com/ce7d41ff714e4a7c88081c30d1cda6f8.png[/img]
Glacors [IMG]http://gyazo.com/03355425c24acd2031ed88b5fb865493.png[/img]
If you would like to see more images please post below what type of images and I will post them onto this thread.
Thanks for looking James.
[/CENTER]
